metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Name of the diagnostic settings.
Specify the Log Analytics workspace the Azure Kubernetes Service should be connected to
Whether to stream AllMetrics logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream kube-apiserver logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream kube-audit logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream kube-controller-manager logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream kube-scheduler logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream cluster-autoscaler logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream kube-audit-admin logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream guard logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream cloud-controller-manager logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream csi-azuredisk-controller logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream csi-azurefile-controller logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream csi-snapshot-controller logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False

metadata.displayName: Prefix to target resources matching a filter
metadata.description: Only targets resources matching this name filter
Enable or disable the execution of the policy
The diagnostic settings profile name

Select Log Analytics workspace from dropdown list. If this workspace is outside of the scope of the assignment you must manually grant 'Log Analytics Contributor' permissions (or similar) to the policy assignment's principal ID.
Whether to enable metrics stream to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to enable logs stream to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to require that the workspace of the diagnostic settings matches the workspace deployed by this policy

metadata.description: Only targets resources matching this name filter
Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Name of the diagnostic settings.
Select the Log Analytics workspace from dropdown list
Whether to stream QueryStoreRuntimeStatistics logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream QueryStoreWaitStatistics logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream Errors logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream DatabaseWaitStatistics logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream Blocks logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream SQLInsights logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream SQLSecurityAuditEvents logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream Timeouts logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream AutomaticTuning logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream Deadlocks logs to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream Basic metrics to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream InstanceAndAppAdvanced metrics to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
Whether to stream WorkloadManagement metrics to the Log Analytics workspace - True or False
